name: Project 1
description: A brief description of the project. This project focuses on web development with a full-stack architecture.
challenges: Some of the challenges faced include integrating the backend with the frontend and optimizing the database queries.
improvements: In the future, I plan to implement a more efficient caching strategy and improve the UI/UX design.

name: Project 2
description: A social media application with real-time messaging and authentication.
challenges: Some challenges faced include real-time message handling and managing multiple user states.
improvements: I plan to add a more robust notification system and enhance the scalability of the backend.

name: Project 3
description: A simple task management web application with user authentication and task categorization.
challenges: I faced difficulties with task categorization and making the app mobile-responsive.
improvements: I plan to integrate a more powerful database and work on the mobile responsiveness of the app.
